name: President Erect VR
description: Frustrated by the current political climate? Slap and Punch the President Erect or Smack him with a celebrity Dildo.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent of greater Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 280 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-46700 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent of greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 280 MB available space
